page.title: 15SHOTESHAM/HOWE ATTITUDES
page.content: {YOUNGER VIEW}We like living in Shotesham as it}peaceful. We are lucky to have such a pretty area for cycling and walking. People are so friendly, we even have the use of a private swimming pool and tennis court in the summer. In the winter all the children toboggan down church hill. The disadvantages are that there are few children of one age group, so there is no youth club. {OLDER VIEW}Shotesham is a pleasant village in which to live. Unfortunately with the closure of the school and the village shop the pattern of life has changed. On a walk through the village perhaps the only signs of life are the passing cars and a tractor working in the fields. While we have our W.I., Wives' Group and Over 60s club, there is very little for the young people in the village.
